channel.title: Barrows
channel.description: Im trying to make a barrows shop. I was wondering, where is it where I can change the shop keeper, and how much each item costs? (Im turing the Varrok clothes shop into a barrows shop.)

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

To change the prices go into shop.cfg then search the item up. You will see 3 bunches of numbers next to it after examine info. Change these to the price u want.

To change the shop keeper open up autospawn.cfg and search for the old shop keeper. Replace this id with the new one you want. Then open up client.java and search for the old id again and it will come up the id with shop stuff. Change this id with the new one.

Now u got editted prices and editted shop keeper. Hope this helps
Rep++?

Read full topic
